command.text: declare @message nvarchar(4000), @dayLimit varchar(16), @inputSiteGroup nvarchar(256), @differentAccount nvarchar(256), @unitName nvarchar(1023) select @unitName = case when @@language = 'v' then ten_dvcs else ten_dvcs2 end from dmdvcs where ma_dvcs = @@unit select @dayLimit = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_xknvl_gh' select @message = 'this._unitCode=''' + @@unit + ''';this._unitName=''' + replace(replace(isnull(@unitName, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';this._dayLimit=' + @dayLimit + ';active$FormFilter$(this);' select @message as message return
